item.title: MolReFlect: Towards In-Context Fine-grained Alignments between Molecules and Texts
item.description: MolReFlect achieves state-of-the-art molecule-text alignment by using a teacher-student LLM framework that generates fine-grained alignments, improving accuracy and explainability.
